incidents.name: Multiple Twilio Usage and Reporting Products Impacted by Request Timeouts and Delays in Handling New Data

incident_updates.body: Super SIM Usage Records API and Data Insights, Messaging Insights, Monitor Events, and Account Insights were degraded for 11 minutes between 19:13:20 UTC and 19:24:10 UTC on 01/24/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced request timeouts and/or delays in recent events being reflected in results from API responses or Console.

incidents.name: Issues Creating New Frontline Instances on Twilio Accounts

incident_updates.body: New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is operating normally at this time. This incident is resolved.

New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing problems creating new Frontline instances on Twilio Accounts and are working to deploy a fix. 

Current workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1. 

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

While we investigate, a workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1

We are investigating customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with creation of new accounts in console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating Issues With Creation of New Accounts

incident_updates.body:
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with New Account creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers investigated a customer impact of a retroactive issue with Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console that was degraded for 30 minutes between 3:10 PM and 3:40 PM Pacific Time on 01/04/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced issues with appropriately submitting tickets, chat with agents, view their ticket history, or see their current support plan during the outage window.

incidents.name: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API

incident_updates.body: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API has been resolved.

Bulk Export Tool is now operating normally and customer should be able to use the functionality now.  We will continue to monitor for system stability. Well provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate elevated latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Bulk exports. Customers may experience inaccurate estimated completion times. All new and existing bulk exports will not be completed until the issue is resolved. We recommend waiting to submit any new requests until the issue is resolved. 

Our engineering team is actively working on this issue and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
